### Loading Brewery Data

```{r}
fermentation_data <- read_excel("brewnalysis_test_data.xlsx") %>%
  janitor::clean_names()

beer_a_b5 <- fermentation_data %>%
  # dplyr::filter(brand == "beer_a", batch_number == 5) %>%
  select(brand, batch_number, fermentation_day, gravity, p_h)

grav_plot <- ggplot(beer_a_b5, aes(x = fermentation_day, y = gravity, color = brand, shape = factor(batch_number))) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line()

ph_plot <- ggplot(beer_a_b5, aes(x = fermentation_day, y = p_h, color = brand, shape = factor(batch_number))) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line()

grav_plot
ph_plot

```
